00024 ;; List of custom models. Each model is defined using a number of lines. The
00025 ;; first line is the options for the model, i.e. whether it is a parent for
00026 ;; other models, and whether it can be password-protected. Every line after
00027 ;; that is a column in the database.
00028 ;;
00029 ;; The columns lines determines the format of the database table. Each
00030 ;; column is its line with a number of comma-seprated values. The first value
00031 ;; must be the name of the column, and the second value must be the type. After
00032 ;; that, everything else is option.
00033 ;;
00034 ;; Optional value: key (whether the column is a key), null (if the
00035 ;; column can be NULL), auto_increment (does the column automatically increment),
00036 ;; default (default value for the column), and comment (comment for the column).
00037 [models]
00038 User[] = "protect,parent"
00039 User[] = "id,int,key=primary,auto_increment=true"
00040 User[] = "name,varchar(11),key=unique"
00041 User[] = "password,blob"
00042 User[] = "email,varchar(50),null"
00043 
00044 Page[] = "parent"
00045 Page[] = "id,int,key=primary,auto_increment=1"
00046 Page[] = "name,varchar(11),key=unique"
00047 
00048 ;; List of possible groups. Each group is set to a comma-separated
00049 ;; list of permissions. See db/Object.php for more information on
00050 ;; how to format permissions.
00051 [auth]
00052 admin = *-*-*
00053 regular = Page-get-*
00054 
00055 
00056 ;; Cache options. Use "action.actionname" replacing actionnname
00057 ;; with one of the actions above to enable to disable caching for
00058 ;; that action. The expires option is how long until a
00059 ;; cache expires in seconds.
00060 [cache]
00061 action.action1 = true
00062 action.action2 = false
00063 action.action3 = false
00064 expires = 3600
00065 
00066 
00067 ;; Custom paths to the cache, templates, log, and uploads.
00068 [paths]
00069 cache = ROOTDIR/cache
00070 templates = ROOTDIR/templates
00071 log = ROOTDIR/log
00072 uploads = ROOTDOR/uploads
